name: Modern Ultrasonic Humidifier
description: A sleek and quiet ultrasonic humidifier that provides a comfortable and healthy living environment. Perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, and offices.

name: Professional Kitchen Knife Set
description: A complete set of high-carbon stainless steel kitchen knives with a stylish wooden block. Sharp, durable, and perfect for any home chef.

name: Smart Fitness Tracker Watch
description: Track your fitness goals with this stylish and feature-packed smartwatch. Monitors heart rate, steps, sleep, and more. Compatible with iOS and Android.

name: High-Capacity Portable Charger
description: Never run out of battery again with this high-capacity portable charger. Fast charging and compatible with all major devices.

name: Immersive Gaming Headset
description: Experience immersive audio with this comfortable gaming headset. Features noise-cancelling microphone and surround sound.

name: HD Camera Drone
description: Capture stunning aerial photos and videos with this easy-to-fly HD camera drone. Perfect for beginners and hobbyists.
